text:
Three persons who were involved in crime activities continuously were detained under the Goondas act by the city police on Monday.

R. Muthu alias Javaimuthu alias Muthukumar (32) of Ammapet, T. Murugan (31) of Kitchipalayam and A. Rajkumar (30) of Ammapet were involved in robbing at knife point on January 22.

They were arrested and lodged at prison. Inquiries revealed that a murder case and a robbery case were pending against Muthu, while Rajkumar and Murugan were involved in robbing at knife point.
title: Three detained under Goondas act
